title: Looking to Buy the Following Hal Chase Cards
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy the Following Hal Chase Cards
posts.post_content:
Will overpay for the following: 

Any T206 pose with Broadleaf, Brown Lenox or Drum back.

PM or email me through Net 54, thanks.
Hey Jeff, no browns for Chase.  I'd love to see scans of a Drum blue.
Another card crossed off my list! :)
